messages.speech: Just like the techniques to avoid SQL injection, you need to use a parameterised XPath interface if one is available, or escape the user input to make it safe to include in a dynamically constructed query. If you are using quotes to terminate untrusted input in a dynamically constructed XPath query, then you need to escape that quote in the untrusted input to ensure the untrusted data can not try to break out of that quoted context.
